name: Agrupacion Española de Fabricantes de Conservas Vegetales
membership: AGRUCON es socio de la FIAB (Federación Española de Industrias de Alimentación y Bebidas), TomatoEurope(Processors Association), AMITOM (Association Mediterraneenne Internationale de la Tomate) y el WPTC (World Processing Tomato Council)
memberOrga:
Los socios de AGRUCON son empresas españolas transformadoras de tomate:
AGRAZ, TRAVIR, ALSAT, CONESA, CONSERVAS CIDACOS, IAN, INPRALSA, NESTLE ESPAÑA, TOMATES DEL SUR, PRONAT
goal: Agrupar a las empresas fabricantes de conservas vegetales y representar, promover y defender sus intereses colectivos
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Common Agricultural Policy (CAP), Climate Change (Emmissions Trading Scheme, ETS),  Trade negotiations & Agreements specially with Ukraine, Brexit, Unfair Trade Practices Directive (UTP)
